reviews.Title: Good choice
reviews.Comment:
I wanted to experience something new.
Upgraded from
Here are few things i need to point out
1 - Camera is Good but need updates Camera needs to be optimised
2 - Performance is just great but phone is heating which is causing battery draning issue

3 - battery is too bad it's just giving 3 to 4 hours of screen on time..

Overall the phone is good

But I'm disappointed in BATTERY

Samsung need to roll out updates soon to optimised battery , and improving camera

reviews.Title: Value-for-money
reviews.Comment: Good phone, Camera is good, design and performance is also good. But taking everything in totality, price is little higher

reviews.Title: Must buy!
reviews.Comment:
Camera is good but could have been better, rest all far better than my old iphone 11, loving it, performance is super, battery is lasting me more than 1 day (using light performance mode), screen is amazing even in FHD, screen on time would be around 9 hrs.
UI is THE best, speakers are nice, Samsung AI features are amazing.

reviews.Title: Wonderful
reviews.Comment: Impressed with the performance. Value for money.camera zoom quality is really good.
